item.title: What to know about Fat Bear Week, and the brawny bruins ready to battle for the title
item.description: The annual Fat Bear Week featuring gluttonous brown bears at Alaska’s Katmai National Park and Preserve is back

item.title: Portland to issue land use violation notice to ICE building for allegedly breaching detention limits
item.description: Portland, Oregon, says it will issue a land use violation notice to the city's U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement building

item.title: UK police arrest two men and a woman on suspicion of assisting Russian intelligence

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 07-30-50-54-62, Powerball: 20
